column2:
"/ci1 1 My dear <%me>!
I have come to your assistance! With I at your side, you have the strength of a thousand men!"
"/ci1 2 The enemies here are no more! Well, off you go! Win the day for us!"

"My dear <%me>...
I'm so sorry that I couldn't be of more use. I shall retire."

"I'm so sorry...
Saga, please...
Take care of them..."
"Saga, no! I can't do this alone! Please come back!"
